mapper.select: /*OperationMapper.getPviDailyGenData */ SELECT SUM(IFNULL(D_TOT_GEN_KWH, 0)) AS totGenKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_GEN_KWH, 0)) AS periodGenKwh FROM NRT_PVI_DAILY_STAT WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')

/*OperationMapper.getEssSummary */ SELECT SUM(IFNULL(D_TOT_CHARGE_KWH, 0)) AS totChargeKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_TOT_DISCHA_KWH, 0)) AS totDischaKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh FROM NRT_PCS_DAILY_STAT WHERE V_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')

/*OperationMapper.getOperationChart */ SELECT time, SUM(IFNULL(periodGenKwh, 0)) AS periodGenKwh , SUM(IFNULL(periodChargeKwh, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh, SUM(IFNULL(periodDischaKwh, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh FROM ( ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_GEN_KWH, 0)) AS periodGenKwh, 0 AS periodChargeKwh, 0 AS periodDischaKwh FROM NRT_PVI_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) UNION ALL ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, 0 AS periodGenKwh, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh FROM NRT_PCS_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) ) AS DATA GROUP BY time

/*OperationMapper.getOperationTable */
SELECT time, SUM(IFNULL(periodGenKwh, 0)) AS periodGenKwh , SUM(IFNULL(totGenKwh, 0)) AS totGenKwh , SUM(IFNULL(periodChargeKwh, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh , SUM(IFNULL(periodDischaKwh, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh , SUM(IFNULL(totChargeKwh, 0)) AS totChargeKwh , SUM(IFNULL(totDischaKwh, 0)) AS totDischaKwh FROM ( ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_GEN_KWH, 0)) AS periodGenKwh, SUM(IFNULL(D_TOT_GEN_KWH, 0)) AS totGenKwh , 0 AS periodChargeKwh, 0 AS periodDischaKwh , 0 AS totChargeKwh, 0 AS totDischaKwh FROM NRT_PVI_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) UNION ALL ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, 0 AS periodGenKwh, 0 AS totGenKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_TOT_CHARGE_KWH, 0)) AS totChargeKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_TOT_DISCHA_KWH, 0)) AS totDischaKwh FROM NRT_PCS_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) ) AS DATA GROUP BY time

/*OperationMapper.getOperationTableCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT time, SUM(IFNULL(solarGenKwh, 0)) AS solarGenKwh , SUM(IFNULL(periodChargeKwh, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh, SUM(IFNULL(periodDischaKwh, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh FROM ( ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_GEN_KWH, 0)) AS solarGenKwh, 0 AS periodChargeKwh, 0 AS periodDischaKwh FROM NRT_PVI_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) UNION ALL ( SELECT V_TIME AS time, 0 AS solarGenKwh, SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_CHARGE_KWH, 0)) AS periodChargeKwh , SUM(IFNULL(D_PERIOD_DISCHA_KWH, 0)) AS periodDischaKwh FROM NRT_PCS_HOURLY_STAT WHERE V_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') GROUP BY V_TIME ) ) AS DATA GROUP BY time ) AS T

/*OperationMapper.getEventStatusSummary */ SELECT V_DETAIL_CD AS grId, V_CD_NM AS grNm, IFNULL(fault, 0) AS fault, IFNULL(warning, 0) AS warning FROM NST_CD_DETAIL AS CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT V_GR_ID , SUM(if(EVENT01.V_EVENT_LVL='F',1,0)) AS fault , SUM(if(EVENT01.V_EVENT_LVL='W',1,0)) as warning FROM NHT_EVENT AS EVENT01 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT V_DEVICE_ID, V_START_TIME, V_END_TIME, V_EVENT_STATUS_CD, V_EVENT_NM FROM NHT_EVENT WHERE V_EVENT_STATUS_CD = 'SD005' AND V_END_TIME != '' AND V_END_TIME IS NOT NULL ) AS EVENT02 ON EVENT01.V_DEVICE_ID = EVENT02.V_DEVICE_ID AND EVENT01.V_START_TIME = EVENT02.V_START_TIME AND EVENT01.V_EVENT_NM = EVENT02.V_EVENT_NM WHERE EVENT01.V_START_TIME LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'),'%') AND EVENT01.V_EVENT_STATUS_CD != 'SD005' GROUP BY EVENT01.V_GR_ID ) AS DATA ON CD.V_DETAIL_CD = DATA.V_GR_ID WHERE CD.V_MASTER_CD = 'SM400' AND V_DETAIL_CD IN ('100', '200', '311', '420')
